svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 8 2020

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 8, 2020" date: "2020-11-08"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
• OpenEthereum v3.1 - continues from last stable release (v2.5.13), removes all non-core things from
client; includes db migration tool for v2.7
• Péter Szilágyi benchmarks snap sync v fast sync
• Optimal chunking size for code merklization
• Video and notes from latest 1559 call , lots of talk about how to do more tests
• Micah Zoltu: we need 1559 so normal people can use Ethereum
EIPs/standards
• EIP3102 : Binary trie structure
• EIP3091 : Block explorer API routes
Proof of Stake launch
• Deposit contract is live at 0x00000000219ab540356cBB839Cbe05303d7705Fa or depositcontract.eth. Chain
launch on Dec 1 if we get 16384 deposits (524288 ETH) by Nov 24. you can use the launchpad or CLI
deposit tool Please verify with multiples sources the address/domain that I or anyone else gives you
Proof of stake spec v1.0.0
• you can use the launchpad or CLI deposit tool
• Please verify with multiples sources the address/domain that I or anyone else gives you
• Proof of stake spec v1.0.0
• Vitalik: why proof of stake ; more decentralized, much better security
• Towards formal semantics of the proof of stake spec
• Video of team presentations from Medalla data challenge
• Lighthouse update : deposit contract launch
• Prysm update : mainnet announcement and learnings from Medalla non-finalization
Layer2
• Arbitrum ports Uniswap to its rollup. 2k gas per trade, available using Kovan testnet as layer1
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Matcha by 0x !
Matcha aggregates liquidity across decentralized exchange networks to offer you the best price on
every token swap. Trade 30+ DeFi tokens on Matcha today!
Stuff for developers
• typechain v4
• Tenderly adds proxy support
• Solt : contract verification from command line (formerly solc-sjw) regardless of framework/structure
• Running a keeper from Keep3r Network on Zeppelin’s Defender
• Getting randomness in an NFT with Chainlink tutorial
• BitQuery compares themselves to TheGraph
• Learning about the EVM by reading GasToken code
Security
• PercentFinance bug freezes balances . Forking good code and adding to it can easily make it buggy.
• Axion gets immediately hacked. CertiK says malicious code added post-audit
• Sandwich attack - frontrunning and backrunning your uniswap transaction to avoid the slippage
tolerance
Enterprise
• AP records its American election race calls on Ethereum mainnet
• Verizon to log press releases on Mad Network , an Ethereum sidechain
Application layer
• 1inch v2 - new algo for discovery and routing, new front end, fewer failed txs
• Request Network adds recurring invoices
• Voting on Ethereum? Check out Vocdoni
Regulation/business/tokens
• SEC loosens some security registration exemptions
General
• Dilbert’s election day cartoon was about Ethereum
• ZenGo’s Two Party Distributed RSA Modulus Generation in Rust
• Brave hits 20 million monthly active users
Job Listings
• Argent is hiring a Senior Android Engineer (Remote, Europe only)
• Celer hiring Solidity and Go devs. Email: hiring@celer.network
• Join Chainlink as a Node Operator Community Manager
• Trail of Bits hiring cryptography analyst & blockchain security engineers
• 0x looking for Matcha marketing manager and all flavors of developers
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces), payable in ETH (or
250 DAI or 250 USDC) to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions? thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
Download The Crypto News Podcast
Episode 2: Wyre’s Michael Dunworth
If you want to support Week in Ethereum News, download and subscribe to my podcast!
Find out why Michael thinks ETH is going to $3000 and which corporate treasuries will buy BTC
If you’re wondering “ why didn’t my post make it into Week in Ethereum News ,” then please put it on
an Ethereum subreddit; emails/DMs are not part of my workflow.
Please click the following if you’re interested in sponsoring the newsletter .
Follow the newsletter on twitter: @WeekinEthNews
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-8-2020/
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
• Nov 12-13 - Baseline Protocol Summit
• Nov 16 - MetaMask Provider breaking changes
• Nov 19 - EthBerlin 2.5: Talk Show
• Nov 24 - last day to deposit to be in proof of stake genesis block
• Dec 1 - Proof of stake launch (if enough deposits by Nov 24)
• Dec 3 - Ethereum in the Enterprise - Asia Pacific
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
